creator: gadams@apache.org
text: Recent problems reported with use of application/vnd.hp-PCL versus application/x-pcl might be avoided if a warning were emitted when encountering a MIME type on a <renderer/> configuration element that does not match any known type.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text:
Resolved to WONTFIX since:

(1) renderer configuration is optional, so reporting a warning is overkill;

(2) there is already a log message which can be enabled in logging.properties by using:

org.apache.fop.renderer.AbstractConfigurator.level = DEBUG

this log will report both the absence and presence of a user configuration for a specific renderer
